pages.text: Rhodonite crystals exist as is inside of the Rhodonite Ores. Sadly due to our current understanding of Rhodonite and its processing, we can only extract a small amount of powder from $(thing)smelting$() of the $(item)Rhodonite Ore$().
As you can see here, smelting of the Ore is really inefficient as is at this moment in time.
Through Rabu's dragon magic, we are able to recreate the powder of the broken gems into full gems again, albeit very inefficient.

pages.title: Rhodonite Storage
pages.text: Not useful for any processes known to us at this point in time, it proves an incredible way to store crystals in a more compact manner.
